entries.title: Your Monday Briefing: Argentina Triumphs
entries.description: Plus: A Times analysis of how Russia bungled the invasion.

entries.title: Ukraine Says Russia May Be Planning Winter Offensive
entries.description: An adviser to President Volodymyr Zelensky urged Western allies to take seriously the threat of a new Russian onslaught, which could include mass infantry attacks.

entries.title: U.K. Moves to Eliminate Some Liquid and Laptop Airport Security Rules
entries.description: New technology could clear a path for relaxed security checks at airports by June 2024.

entries.title: What Russia Got Wrong
entries.description: A cascade of military failures started with Vladimir Putin.

entries.title: Counting Russia’s War Dead, With Tips, Clips and a Giant Spreadsheet
entries.description: Amid doubts about Moscow’s true war losses, Russian data journalists and volunteers use news articles, tombstone photographs and other open-source information to tally the Russian toll from the war in Ukraine.

entries.title: Local News Outlet in New York Faces New Hurdle: A Declined Visa
entries.description: Phil O’Brien, a Briton who has run a Manhattan publication for several years, had his visa denied because immigration officials deemed his struggling business “marginal.”

entries.title: How Can Tainted Spinach Cause Hallucinations?
entries.description: A food recall from Australia sheds light on an unusual aspect of brain chemistry.

entries.title: North Korea Fires Missiles Capable of Reaching Japan
entries.description: The launches were the first missile tests by North Korea since it fired an ICBM a month ago.

entries.title: Military Spending Surges, Creating New Boom for Arms Makers
entries.description: The combination of the war in Ukraine and concern about longer-term threats from Russia and China are driving a bipartisan push to increase U.S. capacity to produce weapons.

entries.title: Where Romantic Poetry in a Fading Language Draws Stadium Crowds
entries.description: That 300,000 people celebrated Urdu verse during a three-day festival was testament to the peculiar reality of the language in India.

entries.title: Taraneh Alidoosti, Iranian Actress, Arrested
entries.description: The actress, Taraneh Alidoosti, had urged people to speak out after the execution of a man involved in nationwide demonstrations.
